member.name: T:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.ResxSettingsAttribute
member.summary: Attribute force generation of matching resx files to this class instead of a class matching the filename.

member.name: M:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.ResxSettingsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Attribute force generation of matching resx files to this class instead of a class matching the filename.

member.name: P:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.ResxSettingsAttribute.StaticMembers
member.summary: Set if the class should have static members. Default is true.

member.name: P:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.ResxSettingsAttribute.MembersVisibility
member.summary: Set the visibility of the members. Default is private.

member.name: P:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.ResxSettingsAttribute.ForEnum
member.summary: Set if it should add a helper to get translations for Enum members of the given type

member.name: F:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.Visibility.NotSet
member.summary: Used to indicate that the visibility is set elsewhere, or use default

member.name: F:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.Visibility.NotGenerated
member.summary: For inner classes, indicates that the inner class should not be generated

member.name: F:Catglobe.ResXFileCodeGenerator.Visibility.SameAsOuter
member.summary: For inner classes, use the same visibility as the outer class
